name: ASAP (As Smooth As Possible)
description:
There is a problem. You are not smooth. You are doomed to a rough and scraggly future. This is your fate, unless...  your legs have anything to say about it.

Play as your legs on a hoverboard (segway) taking on a quest to clear all the hair from over 5 unique skin zones. Find some prizes hidden in lumps! You can find a fidget spinner in there sometimes! I love fidget spinners.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Playable on Keyboard and Gamepad, co-op for 2 enabled!

Keyboard:

  • WASD - Move
  • F - Jump
  • G - Dash

Gamepad (Recommended XBox 360 Gamepad):

  • Left Stick - Move
  • A Button - Jump
  • B Button - Dash

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE INDIE GAME JAM, PRESENTED BY SCHICK HYDRO
This game was created as part of "The Indie Game Jam, presented by Schick Hydro" in partnership with Playcrafting. This groundbreaking 48-hour, indie game jam took place in New York City from November 17-19. During the jam, 20 of the rising stars of independent game development created games based on the theme of Schick Hydro’s mission: to “protect and defend.” The games will be showcased in a custom arcade – “The Indie Game Jam Arcade” – at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles at The Game Awards 2017 on December 7th.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made By:

  • Thu Tran
  • Sam Eng
  • Prashast Thapan
  • Neil Sveri
